hadiths.text: It was narrated that Aishah, may Allah be pleased with her, said:"I was in front of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) when he was praying, and when I wanted to leave I did not want to get up and pass in front of him, so I just slipped away slowly and quietly

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَا يَقْطَعُ الصَّلاَةَ وَمَا لاَ يَقْطَعُ إِذَا لَمْ يَكُنْ بَيْنَ يَدَىِ الْمُصَلِّي سُتْرَةٌ
chapter.eng-name: Mention of what interrupts the prayer and what does not if a praying person does not have a Sutra in front of him
